properties.entry: Select VET.VET_ID, VET.VET_PHOTO, VET.VET_SCORE, PROF.VET_QUAL, PROF.VET_SPCL, PROF.VET_PROFILE_ID, PROF.VET_NAME, PROF.VET_ADDR1, PROF.VET_ADDR2, PROF.VET_ADDR3, PROF.VET_CITY, PROF.VET_PINCODE, PROF.VET_STATE From VET_MAIN VET INNER JOIN VET_PROFILE PROF ON VET.VET_PROFILE_ID = PROF.VET_PROFILE_ID WHERE VET.VET_ID =?

Select VET.VET_ID, VET.VET_PHOTO, VET.VET_SCORE, PROF.VET_QUAL, PROF.VET_SPCL, PROF.VET_PROFILE_ID, PROF.VET_NAME, PROF.VET_ADDR1, PROF.VET_ADDR2, PROF.VET_ADDR3, PROF.VET_CITY, PROF.VET_PINCODE, PROF.VET_STATE From VET_MAIN VET INNER JOIN VET_PROFILE PROF ON VET.VET_PROFILE_ID = PROF.VET_PROFILE_ID
